member.name: NMLVCACHEHINT
member.summary: Contains information used to update the cached item information for use with a virtual list view.

member.name: NMLVCACHEHINT.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains information about this notification message.

member.name: NMLVCACHEHINT.iFrom
member.summary: Starting index of the requested range of items. This value is inclusive.

member.name: NMLVCACHEHINT.iTo
member.summary: Ending index of the requested range of items. This value is inclusive.
